contracts.description:
Construction of single storey extension to Pendle Wavelengths Leisure Centre.

Suppliers must be able to provide full design ( including architectural, structural and mechanical / electrical design) and construction of the building.

Extension size - Gross External Area 196m2

contracts.title: Provision of Outsourced Internal Audit Services
contracts.description:
Pendle Borough Council is seeking tenders for its Internal Audit Service. This is an independent appraisal function, providing an ongoing review of the systems of internal control as a service to management. The Service will objectively examine, evaluate and report on the adequacy of internal controls as a contribution to the proper, economic, efficient and effective use of resources.

contracts.title: Dynamic Purchasing System for the Provision of Various Engineering Works
contracts.description:
Pendle Borough Council are establishing a Dynamic Purchasing System (DPS) for the provision of various engineering works which will be created following completion of this Pre-Qualification Questionnaire (PQQ) process. Once Bidders have been accepted onto the DPS, they will be invited to tender for individual contracts. The DPS will remain open for a period of 3 years.\r
The five lots available are:\r
Lot 1: Civils\r
Lot 2: Landscape & Environmental\r
Lot 3: Demolition\r
Lot 4: Electric
